post.text:
Join us right here on my Facebook page - for pre and post debate coverage! 

Coverage begins at 8:30pmE!

comment.author: Reed
comment.text: One last thought before I rest up for the debate (lol): When Hildapig goes off on one of her robotic, fact-spouting, name-dropping soliloquies, Trump should counter with "That was very good, ary. It was a shame you couldn't remember so well when you were at the hearings and "couldn't recall" most of the information you were asked about.

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: It must really gall his supporters that he's losing so badly. Trump is so awful that he can't even beat HILLARY!
